passive.name: Monteiro Momentum
passive.description: Christie gains [10%] bonus movement speed for [3.5s] after hitting with any ability.

q.name: Dynamic Rhythm
q.description: 3 charges [0.8s cd/use]: 1-2 charges: Christie kicks in front of her. Enemies hit take [45/85/155/240/300] damage per hit. 3 charges: Christie performs a powerful kick in front of her, dealing [80/170/300/505/690] damage to hit enemies and stunning them for [0.65s]. The ability charges and goes on cooldown simultaneously, if not used within [3s].

w.name: Samba Slam
w.description: While dancing, Christie thrusts forward and knocks up the enemies in front of her for [0.85s]. She also deals [70/90/185/230/350] damage to them.

e.name: Go Easy On Me!
e.description: Christie charms all enemies in front of her for [1s], causing them to take [30%/30%/35%/35%/40%/50%] increased damage from Christie during the effect.

r.name: Carnival Toss
r.description: Christie leaps in the specified direction. If she catches an enemy, she grabs and throws them a long distance in the direction of the leap. Additionally, she deals [17% MAXHP] damage to them.

level1.name: Agile Strikes
level1.description: Christie's Q ability now applies a [20%] slow for [1s] on each hit.

level1.name: Quickened Earthshatter
level1.description: All of Christie's abilities lose [1s cd]

level1.name: Damage Quest
level1.description: Quest: Deal 8500 damage with Q -> Christie's Q ability gains an additional [15%] damage.

level5.name: Enhanced Momentum
level5.description: Christie's Passive now grants [15%] bonus movement speed for [4s] after hitting with any ability.

level5.name: Combo Master
level5.description: Each Q hit reduces the cooldown of her W, E and R ability by [1s]

level5.name: Speed Burst
level5.description: Item: Upon activation, Christie doubles her movement speed for [1.35s]

level10.name: Wall Impact
level10.description: R: If the thrown enemy hit a wall, they take additional [350/450/650] damage.

level10.name: Mass Toss
level10.description: R: Christie can grab any number of enemies at the same time.

level15.name: Level 1 Mastery
level15.description: You gain all level 1 talents and complete the quest.

level15.name: CC Punisher
level15.description: Christie now deals [20%] more damage to CC-d targets.

level15.name: Weakening Strikes
level15.description: Christie's Q lowers the damage of the damaged target by [4%] for each hit for [3s].

level20.name: Talent Mastery
level20.description: Christie gains all her previous talent options, but loses the chosen ones.

level20.name: CC Hunter
level20.description: Christie moves [40%] faster towards CC-d enemies.

level20.name: Extra Charge
level20.description: Christie gains an additional weak Q charge after the 3rd charge.

level20.name: Enhanced Slam
level20.description: Christie's W ability range is increased massively and its duration is up by [0.75s].

changes: HP per Level increased from 300 to 305
W Ability (Samba Slam) knock-up duration increased from 0.75s to 0.85s
E Ability (Go Easy On Me!) early game damage amp increased: 25%/25%/30%/30%/40%/50% -> 30%/30%/35%/35%/40%/50%
Level 5 Talent b cooldown reduction per Q hit increased from 0.5s to 1s
